response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to recognize your interest and commitment. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you that you will be making a valuable investment that will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details about the product.", "product_price": 14000}
